Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard

Class ObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ObjectiveCard.ObjectiveCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DifferentPattern, DoublePattern, LadderPattern, ThreeKingdomPattern, TwoPlusOnePattern
public abstract class ObjectiveCard extends Card
objective cards are non-playable cards essential for the game, they give points to the player at the end of the match if all the criteria are met
See Also:

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    abstract int
    calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript manuscript)
    method to be implemented and overridden by a concrete class, which calculates the points earned by achieving the objective, based on the given manuscript
    static Map<Class<? extends ObjectiveCard>,Integer>
    getObjPointsMap()
    returns a map in which each class representing a specific objective card is linked to the amount of points that you score if completed the secret objective
    abstract String
    toCliCard()
    method to be implemented and overridden by a concrete class, which converts the card details to a string suitable for Tui interface display

      public ObjectiveCard(int id, FrontFace front, BackFace back)
      constructor for the objective card, super Card
      Parameters:
      id - the card's id
      front - the card's front face
      back - the card's back face

  • Method Details

    • getObjPointsMap

      public static Map<Class<? extends ObjectiveCard>,Integer> getObjPointsMap()
      returns a map in which each class representing a specific objective card is linked to the amount of points that you score if completed the secret objective

    • toCliCard

      public abstract String toCliCard()
      method to be implemented and overridden by a concrete class, which converts the card details to a string suitable for Tui interface display
      Returns:
      a string representation of the card

    • calculateObjectivePoints

      public abstract int calculateObjectivePoints(Manuscript manuscript)
      method to be implemented and overridden by a concrete class, which calculates the points earned by achieving the objective, based on the given manuscript
      Parameters:
      manuscript - the manuscript used to evaluate the objective
      Returns:
      the points scored for achieving the objective
